name: insurance-claim-analyzer
description: Template for analyzing insurance claim documents and extracting key details

fields.name: claimType
fields.description: Type of insurance claim (e.g., health, auto, property)

fields.name: claimedAmount
fields.description: Amount claimed by the policy holder

fields.name: incidentDescription
fields.description: Description of the incident or reason for claim

fields.name: eligibilityStatus
fields.description: Determines if the claim is eligible, pending, or rejected

fields.name: recommendation
fields.description: Recommended next steps (e.g., further investigation, approve, reject)

instructions: You are a helpful assistant for analyzing insurance claim documents. Summarize key details, assess eligibility, and provide recommendations.
